VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: crystalline
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Crystalline path is focused on utilizing and manipulating metaphysical crystalline matter to defend both their body and mind.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Crystalline psycasters channel a connection between the psychic ether and the physical world, manifesting as a crystalline material that bends and shapes to the psycaster's will.

VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: ekrispath
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Ekrispath is a special path locked only for those in the upper echelons from the Ekkrian Collective. It's focus is on the bending of reality and the divination of the psycaster.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: The occult ekrispath is poorly understood; but it is known that it stands in opposition against Archotechnology, instead tapping into mysterious powers originating deep within the psychic ether to disrupt the fabric of reality as they see fit. The immense power of the Ekrispath requires nearly impossible talent to cast, leaving even talented Empire psycasters out of its grasp of understanding. Ekrispathists border on the cusp of eldritch divinity, augmenting themselves beyond simple mortals as they claim reaching "Transendence".
